title: Emmerdale fans won't see Nate identity twist coming - and theories are wrong
text:
Get the biggest soaps stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Emmerdale fans won't see the Nate Robinson identity twist coming - and the theories are wrong.

Actor Jurell Carter has revealed he found out about his character's secret past when he was first cast in the role.

Avid viewers have been trying to guess how he could be linked to the villagers, with many predicting he is a secret Dingle.

Nate's affair with Moira Dingle was finally discovered by Cain Dingle on Monday night's dramatic episode and the hard man is out for revenge.

The shocking truth will be exposed in explosive scenes that end with a massive fireball on a boat - and Jurell believes the audience will be stunned.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Speaking to the Daily Star , the actor said: "There are so many theories out there but when the audience see it they will be shocked.

"I found out about it when I was first cast and I was like ‘Wow.’ I don’t want to spoil it but it’s a massive reveal."

Jurell teased exciting details about the big stunt, where Cain and Nate have a dramatic fight on a boat in the middle of a lake.

He added: “It was like filming a movie. We had stunt coordinators helping us with the fight scenes, and of course there’s an ­explosion."

(Image: ITV)

Emmerdale actress Sally Dexter has promised a "heavy storm" is on the way for the Dingles when Nate's identity is revealed.

She teased the "dire consequences" that will occur as a result of a new twist regarding the newcomer's secret past.

She confirmed emotional scenes were on the cards, even welling up as she spoke to Mirror Online at the Inside Soap Awards 2019 about the upcoming plot.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Not only did Sally hint that not everyone would make it through, she confirmed three characters in particular would suffer as a result.

Sally told us: "Yes, there is a very shocking twist with Nate's identity and it has dire consequences for my son Cain, for Moira my daughter-in-law, and me."

She added: "We have to come through a heavy storm and some of us might not make it. It was some of the most harrowingly emotional scenes I've ever done."

(Image: ITV)

Emmerdale viewers have taken to Twitter with their theories about Nate's true identity.

One viewer said: "If Cain and Nate turn out to be brothers my jaw will hit the floor. I’m likely way off, but I would go out with that. I’d be on board and it would explain a lot."

Another added: "I'm feeling like I'd prefer him to be Faith's son, but his vendetta seems to be against Cain specifically. Is it going to be a repeat of Debbie, where Cain knocked someone up but didn't know, and Faith kept it from him?"

A third said: "So Nate is Cain’s son?! How are they gonna spin that? Ha."

(Image: ITV)

In upcoming episodes, Cain will catch Nate and Moira leaving the hotel and force them into his car.

They will arrive at a lakeside pier for a fishing trip, but they won't be catching anything for their dinner.

Cocky Nate admits that he has been having an affair with Cain's wife, which leads to a violent tussle between the pair.

In the commotion, Moira gets pushed overboard and becomes trapped in weeds under the water.

Above the water there is a huge explosion after a petrol cannister leak - so will anyone die?

*Emmerdale airs weekdays on ITV at 7pm with an extra episode on Thursdays at 8pm
description: Emmerdale actor Jurell Carter found out about his character's secret past when he was first cast - and admits the audience will be stunned
